name: uclusion_node_sdk
description: SDK for the uclusion idea market system. All methods are supported, and each method closely corresponds the given api endpoints

scripts.test: mocha -r esm --recursive test; NUMFAILING=$?; cd ../circleci_orbs; python -m utils.record_testing -n $NUMFAILING -e dev
scripts.testStage: mocha -r esm --recursive testStage; NUMFAILING=$?; cd ../circleci_orbs; python -m utils.record_testing -n $NUMFAILING -e stage
scripts.testProduction: mocha -r esm --recursive testProduction; NUMFAILING=$?; cd ../circleci_orbs; python -m utils.record_testing -n $NUMFAILING -e production
